member.name: M:Sitecore.Xdb.Common.Web.Synchronous.SynchronousExtensions.SuspendContextLock(System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Suspends the lock on HttpContext when invoked from ASP.NET code allowing the specified async method call/task to run in context, and the calling thread to wait without deadlocking. When called outside ASP.NET this just waits for the task to complete.
member.param: The task factory (async method call).

member.name: M:Sitecore.Xdb.Common.Web.Synchronous.SynchronousExtensions.SuspendContextLock``1(System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task{``0}})

member.param: The task factory (async method call).
member.returns: The result of the task invocation.
